entry.title: This is the beginning of a beautiful friendship

content.p: This is the first post on the Antwar blog. The first post served by Antwar. I hope there will be many more. I hope that there are more people out there that want a simple and friendly blogging tool. Because that's what we are trying to build.
The project started out as a fork of Brad Denver's experiment react-static-site. We have come quite a long way already and we want to keep improving Antwar.
We would be happy if you wanted to try Antwar and give some feedback.
